title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the ContinuousLearningCompanion project, including the target audience, desired features, expected outcomes, data sources, integrations, security considerations, and scalability requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations such as scalability, maintainability, security, and performance. The architecture should include the following components: a web application (frontend), a backend API, a database, a recommendation engine, a content management system, and a notification system. Consider the integration with existing learning management systems (LMS) or content providers. Address data privacy and security concerns, as well as scalability requirements for handling a large number of users and content.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the ContinuousLearningCompanion, including the employee-facing and administrative interfaces.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for the ContinuousLearningCompanion, including the recommendation engine, content management, and integration with external systems.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for the ContinuousLearningCompanion, including employee profiles, learning content, and usage data.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop and implement security measures and access controls for the ContinuousLearningCompanion, ensuring data privacy and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the ContinuousLearningCompanion, including automated testing, build, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Define the testing strategy and develop comprehensive test cases for the ContinuousLearningCompanion, covering functional, integration, and performance testing.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop user documentation, training materials, and support resources for the ContinuousLearningCompanion, ensuring smooth adoption and effective use by employees.
